Name: CityMall Tetuan-Zamboanga
Remarks: Anchored by Shop-O-Rama Supermarket , the first CityMall in Mindanao

Name: Gaisano Capital Pagadian
Remarks: The first Gaisano mall in Zamboanga Peninsula ; presently the 3rd largest shopping mall in the region

Name: KCC Mall de Zamboanga
Remarks: Zamboanga 's first nationally owned full scale mall ; KCC 's first mall outside Region XII , largest mall in the region

Name: Lee Plaza City Central
Remarks: Lee Plaza Group 's first mall outside Dumaguete City and Region VII

Name: SM Mindpro Zamboanga
Remarks: In 2017 , SM Prime Holdings bought the mall . Renovations are underway
